about_the_game:
You may directly support the development of Project Wunderwaffe, if you choose.

You can help develop the game by purchasing the Supporter's Pack.
If you purchase the Supporter's Pack, you will receive the following stuff:

Project Wunderwaffe Soundtrack (mp3, wav, flac)
Project Wunderwaffe OST Artbook
Digital Wallpaper

Because music was such an important part of soldiers' and society's lives during WWII, it was nearly impossible to imagine that the Project Wunderwaffe soundtrack would not be created.

This soundtrack includes both original, stylized pieces that represent a classic approach
to orchestral harmony and sound, as well as minimalist, modern ambient tracks.

The OST is a companion piece to Project Wunderwaffe, a game set in World War II reality
that is one-of-a-kind in terms of graphics and sound design.

We are delighted to be able to present it to you.

Have fun with the album!
